posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 17', 'OR Text', '17', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 985 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'A quiet, private getaway in a prestigious gated community set high in the hills overlooking Concord—This is life at Lime Ridge.', 'Our thoughtfully designed apartments for rent in Concord feature spacious open layouts, sleek modern kitchens, private patios, and top-quality finishes throughout.', 'Visit our floor plans page to check availability and start your lease at Lime Ridge today!', 'Features:', 'Modern Flooring Options, Washer/Dryer*, Split Level Floor Plan*, Private Balcony/Deck/Patio, Central Heating, Air Conditioning, Cable/High-Speed Internet Available, Energy Efficient Appliances, Ceiling Fan', '*Select Units', 'Community Amenities:', 'Gated Private Entry, Large Swimming Pool, Controlled Access/Gated, Three Laundry Centers, Assigned Covered Parking', 'Pet Policy', 'We Love Pets!', 'Restrictions Apply.', 'Please see the leasing office for details.', 'Want more information on this unit?', 'See link (below):', '<URL>', 'yvvSzLJv8Kv']
